text: "I applaud the Senate Democrats for proposing a strong package of reforms to help restore our democracy and break the grip of wealthy special interests in Washington. As I have said consistently in this campaign we need to overturn the disastrous Citizens United decision and make government more responsive to the American people. Our elections should be shaped by voters voices not bought and sold by corporations and special interests. Congress should pass this bill as quickly as possible—and should I be elected President I would proudly sign it."
